ARABIC: مَا سَمِعْنَا بِهَٰذَا فِى ٱلْمِلَّةِ ٱلْءَاخِرَةِ إِنْ هَٰذَآ إِلَّا ٱخْتِلَٰقٌ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: We have not heard of this in the old religion. This is merely something contrived.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: We never heard of it in the former faith. It is surely a fabrication.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: We have not heard this in the religious community close to our time. This is nothing but a fabrication.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: We have heard nothing like this in the latest religion. This is only his own false invention.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: “We never heard of this even in Christianity, the latest religion; this is clearly a newly fabricated matter.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: We have not heard (the like) of this in the religion of these later days. This is nothing but an invention!"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: We never heard of this in the former faith; this is nothing but a forgery:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: We have not heard of this in the last religion; this is surely an invention.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: We have not heard of this in later religion. This is naught but an invention.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: We have not heard of any such thing in the old religion. This is nothing but a fabrication.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: We heard not thereof in the later faith; this is naught but an invention.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: We did not hear of this in the latter-day creed. This is nothing but a fabrication.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: We never heard (the like) of this among the people of these latter days: this is nothing but a made-up tale!"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: We have not heard (the like) of this among the people of these later days. This is nothing but an invention!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: We never heard of this in the former religion. It is nothing but an invention.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: We never heard of this in the former faith. This is nothing but a fabrication.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: We have not heard of this in the latest religion. This is not but a fabrication.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [38:7] We never heard of this in the latter-day creed, namely, the creed of Jesus. This is surely [nothing] but an invention, [mere] lies.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (We have not heard of this) which Muhammad says (in later religion) in Judaism and Christianity; they mean to say: we did not hear from the Jews or Christian that God is One. (This) which Muhammad says (is naught but an invention) which Muhammad has invented.
